title: Let’s Go by the Big Bridge
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>….With that said, here is a souvenir for you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Mmm~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>….Ai-san? I’m sorry, was it not to your liking?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ah, sorry, sorry! Ai is happy for the souvenir, and Ai also loves Odaiba’s castellas!! It’s just that Ai wants to go play with you too, Shiotti! Don’t just hang out with Ayumu all the time, hang out with Ai too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I-, I’d be happy to. But unfortunately, I’m not familiar with fun locations….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Leave that to Ai! Then, you’ll go out with Ai next holiday. Okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>….It would be an honor!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Alright, let’s rehearse for that today, shall we? We have to go running before dance practice, right? Come with Ai. Let’s run to the Rainbow Bridge!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>The Rainbow Bridge!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah. Apparently today is Rainbow Bridge Day, so. Let’s go~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
